  • Method Details

    • createBoard

      public void createBoard​(int columns, int rows, int mirrors) throws InvalidNumberException, NegativeNumberException
      Creates a board
      Parameters:
      columns - The number of columns
      rows - The number of rows
      mirrors - The number of mirrors
      Throws:
      InvalidNumberException - If the number of columns is greater than 26 or if the number of mirrors is greter than the number of grids
      NegativeNumberException - If the numbers are negatives

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, int score, int columns, int rows, int mirrors)
      Creates a player
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname
      score - The score
      columns - The columns of the board
      rows - The rows of the board
      mirrors - The mirrors of the board
